docs.title: Omkar Subhash Parab
docs.text:
Backend / Full-Stack Developer (2+ Years Experience)

Python · Django · FastAPI · React · REST APIs · JWT · OCR · Payments

I build production-ready backend systems and full-stack applications, with hands-on experience in fintech platforms, OCR automation, and real-world deployments.

📄 Resume: Download PDF

docs.title: What I Do
docs.text:
• Build scalable backend APIs using Django, Django REST Framework, and FastAPI
  • Design secure authentication, authorization, and RBAC workflows
  • Develop OCR and PDF data extraction systems for enterprise use cases
  • Build and integrate full-stack modules using React + backend APIs
  • Integrate and secure payment gateways like Razorpay and Cashfree
  • Deploy and debug applications on Linux servers with Nginx & Gunicorn

docs.title: Internal Process Automation Tool (Rapid Delivery)
docs.text:
• Python, Flask, SQLite, JS, File System I/O
  • Built a lightweight web application in ~1 hour to assist process teams with data entry
  • Enabled capturing applicant photos, cropping them in-browser, and submitting with required information
  • Implemented non-blocking workflow to:
  • Save images to the organization’s network drive
  • Upload and index images using a predefined reference number
  • Used SQLite for fast local persistence
  • Tool is actively used with 14,000+ entries recorded without failures
  • Improved process efficiency without interrupting ongoing data entry operations

docs.title: HRMS (Human Resource Management System)
docs.text:
• React, REST APIs
  • Developed reusable UI components for attendance, leave, and employee workflows
  • Integrated frontend modules with backend APIs
  • Focused on clean UI structure and maintainable component design

docs.title: ImperaCam – OCR & PDF Data Extraction
docs.text:
• Python, OCR, PDF table extraction
  • Extracted structured tabular data from scanned bank statements
  • Reduced manual effort through automation
  • Integrated OCR into existing enterprise workflows

docs.title: Payments & Integrations
docs.text:
• Razorpay & Cashfree
  • Implemented payment flows with webhook signature verification
  • Integrated external APIs including Shopify Admin APIs

docs.title: Loan Origination & Disbursal Systems (Fintech)
docs.text:
• Django, DRF, FastAPI, React
  • Built loan origination and personal loan disbursal modules used internally
  • Implemented multi-step workflows, approvals, and backend validations
  • Worked closely with business teams to refine functional flows

docs.title: TheLekhani.com – Marathi Content Sharing Platform
docs.text:
• Django, Tailwind CSS, HTMX
  • Built a content sharing platform focused on Marathi-language content
  • Implemented user-generated posts with dynamic interactions using HTMX
  • Deployed on DigitalOcean VPS
  • Used AWS S3 bucket for remote media storage
  • Live: https://thelekhani.com

docs.title: Modi Lipi Converter – Devanagari to Modi Script
docs.text:
• Django, Tailwind CSS
  • Web application to convert Devanagari text into Modi script
  • Designed for linguistic and historical use cases
  • Publicly published and organically reached 24,000+ impressions
  • Received 1,000+ real user visits without crashes or downtime
  • Hosted on PythonAnywhere
  • Live: https://modilipi.pythonanywhere.com/

docs.title: Experience Snapshot
docs.text:
• 2+ years of hands-on development experience
  • Worked on production fintech and enterprise applications
  • Comfortable with backend-heavy systems and real production issues
  • Experience deploying apps on DigitalOcean and AWS S3
  • Contributor to Django Marathi localization (open source)

docs.title: Open Source
docs.text:
• Contributor and coordinator for Django Marathi language translation
  • Official Django localization project
  • Managed translations using Transifex

docs.title: ImperaStack Assistant – RAG-based QA Prototype
docs.text:
• Python, SentenceTransformers, HuggingFace Transformers
  • Built a small Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) prototype for answering questions from internal documents
  • Used all-MiniLM-L6-v2 for embeddings and Flan-T5-Small for text generation
  • Implemented document retrieval + generation pipeline to study retrieval quality and response behavior
  • Live Demo: https://imperastackassistant.streamlit.app/
  • GitHub: https://github.com/ImOmkar/ImperaStack-Assistant

docs.title: Tech Stack
docs.text: Backend: Python, Django, Flask, FastAPI Frontend: React, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS APIs: REST, JWT Authentication, RBAC Databases: PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite OCR / Automation: Tesseract OCR, PDF Data Extraction DevOps: Linux, Nginx, Gunicorn, DigitalOcean, AWS S3 Tools: Git, GitHub, Postman

docs.text:
